        Returns:
        user preferred output folder, default if no preference is set
        See Also:
        getInputPath()

      • getDefaultOutputPath

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultOutputPath()
        Gets the default (OS specific) application output folder path. This should be the "Input" folder within "Documents" or documents equivalent on the user's OS. On non-MacOS Unix this will map to $HOME.
        Returns:
        full path to output folder ending with separator char (typically '/'), so that content may be appended to it
        See Also:
        getDefaultInputPath()

      • getInputPath

        public static java.lang.String getInputPath()
        Gets the currently set application input folder path.
        Returns:
        user preferred input folder, default if no preference is set
        See Also:
        getOutputPath()

      • getDefaultInputPath

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultInputPath()
        Gets the default (OS specific) application input folder path. This should be the "Input" folder within "Documents" or documents equivalent on the user's OS. On non-MacOS Unix this will map to $HOME.
        Returns:
        full path to input folder ending with separator char (typically '/'), so that content may be appended to it
        See Also:
        getDefaultOutputPath()

      • getTourneyNumber

        public static int getTourneyNumber()
                            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Gets the current tournament number from file
        Returns:
        current tournament number, or 1 if IO error encountered
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if tournament file does not contain valid content
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - TournamentNumber.txt could not be found

        public static void noInputFolderPrompt()
        Prompts user that input folder wasn't found. Allows them to choose to download or open their own. Helper function for verifyContent()

                                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                 java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Gets the current tournament name from file
        Returns:
        current tournament name
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - tournament file could not be found

      • setMap

        public static boolean setMap(java.lang.String mapName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the current map.
        Parameters:
        mapName - Name of map to be set as current.
        Returns:
        false if map could not be updated (Doesnt exist, IO error). True otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error for maps.txt opening or writing
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Likely error finding map file

      • setMap

        public static void setMap(java.lang.String mapName,
                          boolean isSpawn)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the current map, with or without spawn locations
        Parameters:
        mapName - Name of map to be set as current
        isSpawn - If spawns should be shown on map or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error for maps.txt opening or writing
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Likely error finding map file

      • setTeam

        public static void setTeam(java.lang.String newTeamName,
                           java.lang.String teamIdentifier)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the current team. E.g., used when setting "The Skyborne" as team A. Updates the output teamA/B image with the new team's image. File is in the format "Team" + teamIdentifier + ".png" Updates the team & teamShort txt files to the new team's name. File name formatted as "Team" + teamIdentifier + ".txt", and "TeamShort" + teamIdentifier + ".txt"
        Parameters:
        newTeamName - Name of the team. Must occur in teams.txt
        teamIdentifier - Value to identify team. Must be a valid character for filesystem
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error writing, reading, or converting files team files.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if fcn args contain invalid characters or do not correspond to a team in teams.txt

      • addTeam

        public static void addTeam(java.lang.String fullName,
                           java.lang.String shortName)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a team with no logo Updates teams.txt.
        Parameters:
        fullName - full team name to add
        shortName - short name of team, will be converted to caps
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO on teams.txt failed.

      • addTeam

        public static void addTeam(java.lang.String fullName,
                           java.lang.String shortName,
                           java.nio.file.Path image)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a team with no logo Updates teams.txt.
        Parameters:
        fullName - full team name to add
        shortName - short name of team, will be converted to caps
        image - Path to image file which will be added to input folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - file copy for image failed, or IO to teams.txt failed
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the Path is a directory or extensionless file

      • findFile

        protected static java.nio.file.Path findFile(java.util.LinkedList<java.nio.file.Path> allTeamImages,
                                             java.lang.String searchFor)
        Takes a list of Paths and finds a certain file by name, excluding extension
        Parameters:
        allTeamImages - list of paths, all paths should be a file with an extension
        Returns:
        Path of found file

      • getShortName

        public static java.lang.String getShortName(java.lang.String longName)
                                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Parses `teams.txt` to get a team's longName from its shortName. Case insensitive search. Uppercase return. Can be used to verify the existence of a team by their full team name.
        Parameters:
        longName - longName to find corresponding shortName of
        Returns:
        Shortname, or null if no shortname can be found
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - teams.txt could not be found

      • convertFormat

        public static boolean convertFormat(java.lang.String inputImagePath,
                                    java.lang.String outputImagePath,
                                    java.lang.String formatName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Converts an image to another format
        Parameters:
        inputImagePath - Path of the source image
        outputImagePath - Path of the destination image
        formatName - the format to be converted to, one of: jpeg, png, bmp, wbmp, and gif
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur during writing

      • getAllMapsFromDisk

        public static java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getAllMapsFromDisk()
                                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Gets an updated list of maps from the maps.txt file
        Returns:
        Each line of the maps.txt file, except empty lines
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if maps.txt file was not found

        Returns:

      • checkForUpdates

        public static void checkForUpdates()
        checks GitHub for any new releases after current version. Takes user to download page if there is a new update.

      • resetPreferences

        public static void resetPreferences()
                             throws java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException
        Calls Preferences.clear() on the FileManager's preference node - effectively resetting it. Does not guarantee full refresh of preferences in app until after a restart.
        Throws:
        java.util.prefs.BackingStoreException - if could not complete clear due to failure relating to the backing store

      • refreshPreferences

        public static void refreshPreferences()
        Attempts to refresh the application's preferences.

      • removeTeam

        public static void removeTeam(java.lang.String teamIdentifier)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Remove the currently set team from given team letter/identifier. Cancels out the actions done by setTeam(String, String).
        Parameters:
        teamIdentifier - Value to identify team. Must be a valid character for filesystem
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if files (Team.txt and TeamShort.txt) couldn't be written to

      • removeMap

        public static void removeMap()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Remove the map image and name. Intended to cancel out all actions taken by setMap(String).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if Map.txt couldn't be written to
